name: Request STATUS messages from EVERYTHING
info:
Each of these inject nodes simply 
contains a GROUP topic for the 
devices on your network.

"tasmotas" & "sonoffs" are for the
default group topics of tasmota.

"AustinOTAs" is for the default group
topic of AustinOTA devices.

All the rest are for custom group 
topics specific to YOUR network.

name: split topic
Adjust these
info:
You'll need one "MQTT-In" for each 
MQTT broker on your network that 
might have Tasmota devices connecting.

name: Adjust these
info:
You'll need one "MQTT-Out" for each 
MQTT broker on your network that 
might have Tasmota devices connecting.

name: Create / update objects
Check if down
Receive STATUS, DevInfo & LWT messages from EVERYTHING
TAZ - TasmOTA Device Status
format:
TasmOTA (etc) Device Status [{{msg.Count}} devices]

Group    MQTT Topic Friendly Name State Since Ch Sig SSID Broker FW / HW IP
{{value.GroupTopic}} {{value.Device}} {{value.FriendlyName}} ✓ UP ✗ DN {{value.up_since_time}} {{value.up_since_date}} {{value.down_since_time}} {{value.down_since_date}} {{value.wifichannel}} {{value.wifisignal}} {{value.wifisignal}} {{value.wifisignal}} {{value.SSID}} {{value.Broker}} {{value.FWVersion}} {{value.HWVersion}} {{value.IPAddress}} {{value.IPAddress}}     🗑

name: DESTROY!
flow.get('home.sonoffs'/'DEVICES')
